chunk.textFormat: The sealant is damaged when the radial play is increasing. The way to check it is to see if water is coming out from the drain hole and seal on the coolant pump.

Go through the information below.
Check if any coolant is coming out in the drain hole on the coolant pump.
This is a sign that the sealant inside the pump is worn out and can cause extended damage in the future.
Information about coolant for a new generation of engines is described in the additional information.
